segments.text: How many undergraduates are hired here each year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Normally , about 60 people . But it may depend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What kind of backgrounds does the staff have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 20 % of them come from other countries and the others are employed from domestic universities and colleges .
segments.speaker: S2
